ygData.subject: Enchant Silver spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Something else you can do is offer a trade.  In High Pass Hold a vendor sells the animation spells for levels 8 and up.  This is the only place to get them.
ygData.messageBody:
Something else you can do is offer a trade. In High Pass Hold a vendor
sells the animation spells for levels 8 and up. This is the only place to
get them. Just like Neriak is a tough place for a high elf, High Pass is
tough for a Dark elf. You might want to pick up two of those spells when
you go to High Pass and then offer a Dark elf a trade for enchant silver.
If I was a Dark elf on a regular server, I'd charge you 15 plat to get that
spell for you. On the hell known as Tallon Zek, you'd never get it.

Drexia (TZ Level 2 woohoo!)
